bug.author: ohsewon
bug.summary: [CI] When ci is overload, unit test is failed(armv7l)
bug.description: only armv7l and below test('tensor_stream_test.video_split') make this case. [ 389s] [ RUN ] tensor_stream_test.video_split [ 390s] /home/abuild/rpmbuild/BUILD/nnstreamer-0.0.3/tests/nnstreamer_sink/unittest_sink.cpp:3059: Failure [ 390s] Expected: g_test_data.received [ 390s] Which is: 3 <-- sometimes value is 4 [ 390s] To be equal to: num_buffers [ 390s] Which is: 5 [ 390s] [ FAILED ] tensor_stream_test.video_split (518 ms) [ 390s] [ RUN ] tensor_stream_test.video_aggregate_1 full log: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/files/2556050/build_log_782_tizen_armv7l_output.txt>build_log_782_tizen_armv7l_output.txt</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/791>#791</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ohsewon>@ohsewon</denchmark-link> Please how to reproduce this issue on local PC.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ohsewon>@ohsewon</denchmark-link> , Could you try to change the number of maximum queues in the config file For example, 8 (by default) ---> 3
I am not sure that this issue is related to cat /proc/sys/kernel/hung_task_timeout_secs 120 setting.
hung_task_timeout has nothing to do with this. It took less than 1 second.

@ohsewon Please how to reproduce this issue on local PC.
I don't know either. just copy ci log..
